member.name: F:GemBox.Spreadsheet.OdsOptions.None
member.summary: Do not preserve ODS parts and ignore display values (display strings). Only parts recognized by GemBox.Spreadsheet API will be loaded. Use this if you are just loading ODS file or you don't want to preserve unrecognized ODS parts for next save.

member.name: F:GemBox.Spreadsheet.OdsOptions.PreserveKeepOpen
member.summary: Preserves unrecognized ODS parts in a way it keeps loaded file open. Use if locking of input file for reading is not a problem and you want to save RAM/CPU when working with large files.

member.name: F:GemBox.Spreadsheet.OdsOptions.PreserveMakeCopy
